modName: Robin De Loxley Breton  Queen of Theives
descriptionHtml:
Another character who I like maybe most of all
I was inspired with the legends about Robin Hood or Robin Loxley. And I thought - what would happen if Robin were Breton girl and instead Britain we put our legend to Skyrim lol^_^


It is Lvl1 save with Hadvar

Mods I used
Better Freckles by Madcat221 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4502
Better Females by Bella http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
RANs Eyebrow Replacer 01-08 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
RANs Vanilla Hair02 plus  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6228
No Dirty Bodies - Caucasian Female Races  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=18
All heils to the modders!

  De Loxley was the old noble Breton family and count Steven De Loxley asked The Nine for the son who would heir his title. However Gods gave him the daughter.  Strange daughter - when she was a child she often told about the dreams where Akatosh and dragons spoke to her and she understood their words...
  One night the enemies burned the Loxley manor and killed the count and his wife but the peasants hid the child in the village. She got the glorious name only - nothing more. She saw the arbitrariness and lawlessness come to High Rock after Great War and hated the people who oppressed the poor. And soon the people of Hich Rock started to talk in whisper about the hooded thief who robs from the rich to give to the poor people. The authorities promised the award for the mysterious theif head but Robin was warned and escaped to Skyrim. And so the adventure began...
author: Sandraniks
